snippet: Underpinning the misuse of customer money was a state of utter chaos at the firm, investigators said, as it rushed to sell assets and unwind positions to stay afloat.
abstract: Underpinning the misuse of customer money was a state of utter chaos at the firm, investigators said, as it rushed to sell assets and unwind positions to stay afloat.

byline.original: By AZAM AHMED and BEN PROTESS

headline.main: MF Global Trustee Sheds New Light on Chaos at Firm
